meta_description: State of the art recording and performance space at the New Orleans Jazz Museum. Join us for daily concerts, lectures, and more!
hours_text:
## ADDRESS

400 Esplanade Ave.  
New Orleans, LA 70116  
(504)-568-6993

Housed in the historic Old U.S. Mint, strategically located at the intersection of the French Quarter and the Frenchmen Street live music corridor, the New Orleans Jazz Museum is in the heart of the city’s vibrant music scene.

[Get Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/H3qATdZU2Ak)

## ADMISSIONS

Adults - $11

Students, senior citizens, active military - $9 

Children 6 and under - FREE

Groups of 15 or more (with reservations) - 20% discount 

School Groups (with reservations) - FREE [Book a group visit.](https://forms.gle/3u3DpqbcRvNsPfRW8)

Purchase tickets for two or more museums - 20% discount 

AAA membership discount - 10% discount

## HOURS

Sunday – Saturday: 9:00AM – 4:00PM

Special closures indicated in red announcement bar.

## ACCESSIBILITY

The New Orleans Jazz Museum is ADA compliant. We recommend using the Barracks Street entrances. Elevators are available and provide access to all levels of the Museum.

## WHERE TO STAY

[ ](https://travel.hilton.com/en_us/guides/new-orleans/?WT.mc_id=zCWDM0US1MB2OLQ3LocalPartner4ToNewMemories_March5Seed_NOLAJazzMuseum_WhereToStay_TNMNOLA6MULTIBR7MSY8i84632)

A proud sponsor of the New Orleans Jazz Museum, Hilton offers the definitive guide for New Orleans travel. [Plan your visit today.](https://travel.hilton.com/en_us/guides/new-orleans/?WT.mc_id=zCWDM0US1MB2OLQ3LocalPartner4ToNewMemories_March5Seed_NOLAJazzMuseum_WhereToStay_TNMNOLA6MULTIBR7MSY8i84632)

# Jazz in the very 

# city it was born.

[ Visit Us ](/visit)

Slide 1 Slide 1 (current slide)

[ Get ticekts > ](https://ticketing.louisianastatemuseum.org/webstore/shop/viewitems.aspx?cg=jazz&c=jazztkts)

# Our Mission

[ ](http://squarespace.com)

The New Orleans Jazz Museum celebrates the history of jazz, in all its forms, through dynamic interactive exhibits, multi-generational educational programming, research facilities, and engaging musical performances.

The Jazz Museum enhances New Orleans’ ongoing cultural renaissance by providing diverse resources for musicians and music lovers of all languages and nationalities. We fully explore America’s quintessential musical art form in the city where jazz was born.

[**Learn More**](/about)

### Follow Us On Social Media
